author: Jessica Bursztynsky
title: Cramer: Elizabeth Warren as president would be 'more extreme' on China than Trump
description: The Massachusetts senator is a "much harder line than Trump," CNBC's Jim Cramer says.
content:
An Elizabeth Warren presidency would be really bad news for China, CNBC's Jim Cramer said Monday.
"She is, I would say, far more extreme than President Trump on what it would take to be able to have a trade deal," Cramer said, discussing the Massachusetts se… [+1539 chars]
